steps.title: Draw a square with curved edges, then add a crossed line inside the square.
steps.content: Draw a square with curved edges, then add a crossed line inside the square. Draw another square, make the top part wider than the bottom and replace the edges with curves lines instead of angled.

steps.title: For the arms, add two sausage shapes, one on each arm.
steps.content: For the arms, add two sausage shapes, one on each arm. For the legs, use curved strokes and add a C shape for the feet.

steps.title: Add details to the face.
steps.content: Add details to the face. Draw two small circles for the eyes. Draw a smaller circle inside the big ones and shade a part of the small circle with black. The shaded part would look like a crescent moon. Add the nose. Use two small circles for the nostrils and add a curved line on each side. Draw the mouth using a horizontal line with a triangle on each side for the fangs. Add the ears on each side of the head using C shapes.

steps.title: Draw the hair using small strokes that form into angles.
steps.content: Draw the hair using small strokes that form into angles.

steps.title: Draw the details of the arms and hands.
steps.content: Draw the details of the arms and hands. Use small strokes that shape into angles as you draw the arms to make them look furry. When drawing the fingers, you can use small sausage shapes and a small circular shape on each tip for the fingernails. Add a few horizontal and slanted strokes on the chest of the monster.

steps.title: Use the same strokes used in the hands when drawing the legs, to make them also look furry.
steps.content: Use the same strokes used in the hands when drawing the legs, to make them also look furry. For the toes, use shorter U shaped curves and then add the toenails using small circular shapes.

steps.title: Draw the pupil.
steps.content: Draw the pupil. Add a small circle inside surrounded with two layers of broken line circles. Sketch a small shape at the upper right corner of the eyes where light usually is reflected. Sketch out curved strokes on the upper and lower border of the eye for the eyelids.

steps.title: Draw the mouth.
steps.content: Draw the mouth. Add a zigzag line across the mouth to make it look like a sharp set of teeth.

steps.title: Add details to the wings, make the top sharp and for the bottom part, sketch two curved lines.
steps.content: Add details to the wings, make the top sharp and for the bottom part, sketch two curved lines. Add two inverted V shapes on the arch of each wing.
